  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investigating Electroplating</string>
            <string language="es">Investigación de galvanoplastia</string>
            <string language="ga">Leictreaphlátáil a Fhiosrú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachforschendes Galvanisieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galvanoplastie d'Investigation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Electroplating Investigando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Placcatura elettrolitica Di Studio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρολυτική επιμετάλλωση έρευνας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions for pupils carrying out an experiment to investigate electroplating. Includes diagrams, questions and additional notes for teachers.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones para los alumnos que realicen un experimento con objeto de investigar la galvanoplastia. Incluye diagramas, preguntas y notas adicionales para los profesores.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha do dhaltaí ata i mbun turgnaimh chun leictreaphlátáil a fhiosrú. Áirítear léaráidí, ceisteanna agus nótaí breise do mhúinteoirí leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
            <string language="es">Física</string>
            <string language="ga">Fisic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen für die Schüler, die ein Experiment 
durchführen, um das Galvanisieren nachzuforschen. Schließt 
Diagramme, Fragen und zusätzliche Anmerkungen für Lehrer ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions pour des élèves effectuant une 
expérience pour étudier la galvanoplastie. Inclut des 
diagrammes, des questions et des notes supplémentaires pour des 
professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções para os alunos que realizam uma 
experiência para investigar electroplating. Inclui diagramas, 
perguntas e notas adicionais para professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni per gli allievi che effettuano un 
esperimento per studiare placcatura elettrolitica. Include gli 
schemi, le domande e le note supplementari per gli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες για τους μαθητές που πραγματοποιούν ένα 
πείραμα για να ερευνήσει την ηλεκτρολυτική επιμετάλλωση. 
Περιλαμβάνει τα διαγράμματα, τις ερωτήσεις και τις πρόσθετες
σημειώσεις για τους δασκάλους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
